context: TCE was added to the ampules in the form of a TCE–methanol solution to yield an aqueous phase TCE concentration of 60ppm. The ampules were immediately sealed and incubated for 48h. The MSB in the ampules was sampled and analyzed for TCE. Ampules containing no inoculum served as controls.Determination of the TCE-degradation ability of the hexadecane-degrading microorganism Prior to the start of experiments to determine the ability of the HDM to increase the bioavailability of TCE by degrading hexadecane, information was needed about its ability to degrade TCE. This experiment was conducted in 10ml ampules containing 2.5ml of MSB, hexadecane (100μl) and 5ppm TCE. A 100μl of the resuspended cells was used as an inoculum. The TCE was added in the form of a TCE–methanol solution.
